item.title: Telangana HC: Hearing Writ Pleas Challenging Govt Possession of Patta Lands In Gadwal
item.description: <![CDATA[Justice Nagesh Bheemapaka of the Telangana High Court took on file a batch of writ pleas challenging the alleged attempts by government authorities to take possession of patta lands in Gadwal for constructing a 350-bedded hospital and a nursing college. The judge is hearing writ pleas filed by Chandramma and others, who would contend that the plots were originally assigned for constructing dwelling houses and that their conversion for institutional purposes is arbitrary, illegal, and unconstitut...]]>
item.author: Dc Correspondent, About The Author
